sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Schisme garded and beaten back upon the right owners shewing that our great controversy about Papall power is not a quaestion of faith but of interest and profit, not with the Church of Rome, but with the Court of Rome : wherein the true controversy doth consist, who were the first innovators, when and where these Papall innovations first began in England : with the opposition that was made against them / by John Bramhall. Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.
[5], 485 p.
Imprinted by John Ramzey, Gravenhagh [Netherlands] : 1658.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======

Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.
[5], 485 p.
Imprinted by John Ramzey, Gravenhagh [Netherlands] : 1658.
